extendedInfo.description: In âEerie Estate Agent," it's your job to rent out a haunted house before your tyrannical boss has you fired.It's an interactive novel, where your choices determine how the story proceeds. For example, when your tenants, who haven't slept in days due to bone-chilling whispers emanating from the walls, ask to break their lease, do you:A) Let them transfer their lease to another property?B) Allow them to break the lease, but keep their security deposit?C) Insist on sticking to the terms of the lease?D) Boldly investigate, like all the victims in bad horror films?How will you screw over your tenants? Will you ignore inconvenient supernatural phenomena, or use them to drum up publicity? How will you deal with ghost hunters, squatters, and celebrity tenants? Will you emerge as the top agent? Stage an office coup? Or will you become a permanent resident of 57 Crowther Terrace?

reviews.title: Fun and different
reviews.comment: After being a bit disappointed by the last cog release I think this is a return to form - good writing and an interesting premise makes it a unique and interesting game. Replay value is there although the story hasn\'t changed too much for me in repeat play throughs but I\'m keen to try again!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Quite good
reviews.comment: A good game, quite interesting at times. Not the best choice of game, but worth the money
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Different in a good way...
reviews.comment: I was skeptical at first, readinng the description, but it turns out that CoG is trying it\'s hand at true comedy with this entry. While vastly different from previous titles, it had several laugh out loud moments, and I look forward to CoG trying more with the genre in the future. Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worth the price
reviews.comment: It\'s nice to see something a little different. Keep up the good work folks! Can\'t wait to see more
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waste
reviews.comment: This story is a waste of money. Id give it negative starts if possible
reviews.author: Heather Meadows

reviews.title: AMAZING!!
reviews.comment: Loved every moment of this I must have more please!!!
reviews.author: Brother Char

reviews.title: Not worth the money
reviews.comment: This game was good the first couple times I old played it, however it gets old real fast. I wish time developers what do updates and change the story once in a while. Seems like they abandoned the app. Don\'t waste your money.
reviews.author: Alyssa Maryem

reviews.title: Very Funny Adventure
reviews.comment: Choice Of Games usually make good text adventures, but this one is a lot more humorous and made me laugh while I played.Well worth the money

reviews.comment: This is just... terrible. The older books are so much better... come on guys, get back in the game.
